channel.title: NPCs using other NPCs type ids
channel.description:
Hey guys.
(Base: Trigun (Cleaned V2) )
I don't know exactly what is going on here, so i'm going to just explain whats happening.
I have added the NPC 1314 to my server, and added speech for it. It worked! Perfect. But then i reload the server, now when click on the NPC it is doing the actions for NPC 708.....
Any idea what is even causing it? If you just know where the error is caused, i could look into the code and try to patch it.
Anyone? Thanks!

item.title: NPCs using other NPCs type ids
item.dc:creator: @Hunter_H Hunter H
item.description:
@Hunter_H wrote:

Nono, i meant i added one to the game, not added a custom one.

I’m starting to think its the client now? Because it fetches the NPCslot from there…But does anyone know for sure?

Read full topic
item.source: NPCs using other NPCs type ids

item.title: NPCs using other NPCs type ids
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

Not 100% sure but check the npc ints you used. Only saying this because you said you just added the npc to your server, unless i read wrong lol.

Read full topic
